casebody.data:
No. 288,

Misc.

Steinmetz v. California State Board of Education et al. Mr. Justice Black and Mr. Justice Douglas are of the opinion certiorari should be granted. The Chief Justice took no part in the consideration or decision of this application. A. L. Wirin and Fred Okrand for petitioner. Edmund O. Brown, Attorney General of California, and Richard L. Mayers, Deputy Attorney General, for respondents.

Supreme Court of California. Certiorari denied.
